oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bulūgh al-arab bi-taḥrīr al-nisab / li-Mawlānā al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-Humām Sībawayh zamānih wa-Farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Ghunaymī al-Anṣārī : manuscript, [1622]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ghunaymī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad , -1634
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to a muqābalah note on f. 11r, copy is collated with the author's copy in the presence of the author. The author signed the copy in his handwriting in the last days of Shaʻbān 1031 AH [June 1622 AD].
Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 19.8 x 14 cm. (12 x 7.5 cm.)
MS Arab 153. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Logic
Islamic philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: بلوغ الأرب بتحرير النسب / لمولنا الإمام العلامة الهمام سيبويه زمانه وفريد عصره وأوانه الشيخ شهاب الدين أحمد الغنيمي الأنصاري : مخطوطة، [1622]
